contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=December 2011}} {{Infobox album<!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> |Name = Rude Awakening |Type = [[Album]] |Artist = [[Prong (band)|Prong]] |Cover = Prong rude awakening.JPG |Released = May 1996 |Recorded = 1995 |Genre = [[Groove metal]], [[hardcore punk]], [[industrial metal]], [[alternative metal]] |Length = 45:50 |Label = [[Epic Records|Epic]] |Producer = [[Terry Date]] & [[Tommy Victor]] |Last album = ''[[Cleansing (album)|Cleansing]]''<br />(1994) |This album = '''''Rude Awakening'''''<br />(1996) |Next album = ''[[100% Live]]''<br />(2002) }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{Rating|3|5}}<ref>{{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=album|id=r233946|pure_url=yes}}|title=Rude Awakening - Prong|publisher=[[Allmusic]]}}</ref> }} '''''Rude Awakening''''' is [[Prong (band)|Prong]]'s fifth [[album]]. This album includes [[Tommy Victor]], [[Ted Parsons]] and [[Paul Raven (musician)|Paul Raven]]. ''Rude Awakening'' is an [[enhanced CD]]. It was also released as a special limited edition on 12" red vinyl. The album was reissued in 2008 as a digipack version, featuring four remixes of the "Rude Awakening" single and a new booklet. Victor appears on the [[Argyle Park]] album ''[[Misguided]]'' on the track "Doomsayer". The song shares some of the same guitar riffs as the song "Controller". ==Track listing== #"Controller" – 3:39 #"Caprice" – 2:47 #"Rude Awakening" – 4:18 #"Unfortunately" – 3:08 #"Face Value" – 4:09 #"Avenue of the Finest" – 3:37 #"Slicing" – 3:29 #"Without Hope" – 3:13 #"Mansruin" – 3:29 #"Innocence Gone" – 3:11 #"Dark Signs" – 3:22 #"Close the Door" – 4:05 #"Proud Division" – 5:46 ==Credits== *[[Tommy Victor]] - vocals/guitar *[[Paul Raven (musician)|Paul Raven]] - bass guitar *[[Ted Parsons]] - drums *[[Charlie Clouser]] - drum programming and keyboards ==Chart positions== ===Album=== [[Billboard magazine|Billboard]] (North America) {| class="wikitable" !Year !Chart !Position |- |1996 |The Billboard 200 |107 |} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Prong}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Rude Awakening (Prong Album)}} [[Category:Prong albums]] [[Category:1996 albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by Terry Date]] [[Category:Albums produced by Tommy Victor]] [[Category:Epic Records albums]]
